overview: The Boondockers 6 snowmobile video tells the story of an incredible winter through the eyes of a dedicated group of riders who share a common passion for the steep and deep. From ridiculous jumps and drops, to adrenaline-pumping climbs and over-the-head powder lines that give new meaning to the phrase Heaven on Earth, this season no one held back and the bar was raised with every ride.
title: Boondockers 6
